channel.title: Crisisx is Back! 2012
channel.description:
[CENTER]http://youtu.be/xXOG3DI01AI
[size=12pt]CrisisX is a server founded in 2009. Over the years, CrisisX quickly grew into one of the most well-known and advanced servers in the world reaching first place on most Top Lists. With a short fallout in 2011, we are back better than ever with a new team of developers, experienced staff, dedicated players, and unique qualitable features. Our job is to provide players with a high performance gaming experience.[/size] [/Center]
Play Now:http: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com//www.cx-client.com/webclient.html]//www.cx-client.com/webclient.html[/url] Homepage: [url=http://crisisx.com/index.php]http://crisisx.com/index.php[/url] Forums: [url=http://crisisx.com/forum.php]http://crisisx.com/forum.php[/url]
[size=14pt]Why choose CrisisX?[/size]
[ul][li]Great staff, with weekly updates[/li] [li]24/7 Pking & Skilling Community[/li] [li] Active vBulletin forums[/li] [li]100% Uptime[/li] [li]Double XP Weekends[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt]Features of CrisisX[/size]
[ul][li]Torva, Pernix, & Virtus armours[/li] [li]Chaotic Weapons w/ Minigame[/li] [li]Pk Points shop, with great rewards[/li] [li]Financial Adviser (to store your excess cash)[/li] [li]Castle Wars, Pest Control, Duel Arena, Fight Pits, Warriors Guild + More[/li] [li]Working Highscores[/li] [li]Amazing Webclient[/li] [li]And much, much more![/li][/ul]
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o170/hockeyboyaajh/serverevents.png[/img] [IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o170/hockeyboyaajh/combatcrisis.png[/img] [IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o170/hockeyboyaajh/Mini-games.png[/img] [/CENTER]
We hope to see you in the community soon! :)
P.S. Along with the new owner Crisisx has, we also have a new and improved source with very new and unique features!

item.title: Crisisx is Back! 2012
item.dc:creator: @s_cadet s cadet
item.description:
@s_cadet wrote:

Master Present:

Nice advert, love the media, looking forward to playing

Look forward to seeing you :]

As the server has been only out for about 2 months, we have major updates in the works for the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Crisisx is Back! 2012
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I don’t like it personally, others might.

Looks to me like your average every day server, with an un-managed economy, poorly handled vB forums, and too large a cache.

(In case this message is projected): No, I’m not “hating” or flaming your thread, just saying what I see, and you can use my criticism to build on if you like. If not, can’t stop you, not my server.

Overall, good luck.

Read full topic
